entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NE 58 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
